medical_history.chief_complaint: Absence of an eyelid in the right eye.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms were noted immediately after birth. The neonate was admitted to the NICU for 2 days due to respiratory difficulty.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 2-day NICU admission for respiratory difficulty immediately after birth. Mild oligohydramnios reported during pregnancy. Mother's history includes high blood glucose levels at 6 to 7 months of pregnancy and cord looping around the neck of the fetus at 33 weeks of gestation.
medical_history.family_history: No history of cryptophthalmos or significant abnormalities in immediate or distant families.
